TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Sku extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Defines the SKU of an Azure Search Service, which determines price tier and capacity limits.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the Sku class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype System.Nullable`1<valuetype Microsoft.Azure.Management.Search.Models.SkuName> name) cil managed

Docs.param: The SKU of the Search service. Valid values include: 'free': Shared service. 'basic': Dedicated service with up to 3 replicas. 'standard': Dedicated service with up to 12 partitions and 12 replicas. 'standard2': Similar to standard, but with more capacity per search unit. 'standard3': Offers maximum capacity per search unit with up to 12 partitions and 12 replicas (or up to 3 partitions with more indexes if you also set the hostingMode property to 'highDensity'). Possible values include: 'free', 'basic', 'standard', 'standard2', 'standard3'
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the Sku class.

Gets or sets the SKU of the Search service. Valid values include: 'free': Shared service. 'basic': Dedicated service with up to 3 replicas. 'standard': Dedicated service with up to 12 partitions and 12 replicas. 'standard2': Similar to standard, but with more capacity per search unit. 'standard3': Offers maximum capacity per search unit with up to 12 partitions and 12 replicas (or up to 3 partitions with more indexes if you also set the hostingMode property to 'highDensity'). Possible values include: 'free', 'basic', 'standard', 'standard2', 'standard3'
